close(uint256).details: Called by the raffle owner when the raffle is over. This function will close the raffle to new entries and will call Airnode for randomness.send at least .001 ether to fund the sponsor wallet

params._price: The price to enter the raffle
params._winnerCount: The number of winners to be selected

enter(uint256,uint256).details: To enter more than one entry, send the price * entryCount in the transaction.

params.entryCount: The number of entries to enter

params._raffleId: The raffle id to get the entries of
The raffle id to get the winners of

pickWinners(bytes32,bytes).notice: Randomness returned by Airnode is used to choose winners
